Why electricsuppliesonline.com is a big NONO

I buy a nice CM11A X10 thing from electricsuppliesonline.com/


I pay it with Yahoo Shop and PayPal. All nice.

2 days later I get that they don't actually have, neither can order it. And they offer me to pay twice the price for a similar one.

So I say that that is unfair, and I believe they should updated their webpage and send me a similar (not worse) product of the one I bought (and actually can still buy).

....and they say that it a systems fault (YOUR system, I don't care). They are not able to change their web. So they still appear in Yahoo, Google, ... and that they still offer the more expensive alternative only If I pay the difference... 
The best part, they say that they don't actually have the more expensive alternative they are asking me to pay.

you gotta be kidding electricsuppliesonline ...


Of course I cancel the order, but I should fight for businesses like one you think you have, that destroy the trust in online shopping.





PD> Yes, I am aware this is my second complain post on the blog... I promise next will have something sweet :)
